02.Name: POS/SHR Addenda Record
02.Description: Used to provide additional information for Point-of-Sale (POS) and Shared Network (SHR) entries, often including terminal location details and transaction identifiers.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '02' specifying a POS/SHR addenda record.

ReferenceInformation.Name: Reference Information
ReferenceInformation.Description: Freeform field containing additional transaction reference information, often including terminal ID, location, or other details.

AddendaSequenceNumber.Name: Addenda Sequence Number
AddendaSequenceNumber.Description: Indicates the sequence of this addenda record if multiple addenda are present.

EntryDetailSequenceNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSequenceNumber.Description: Links this addenda record to the associated Entry Detail Record by repeating its trace number's last seven digits.

05.Name: CCD/CTX Addenda Record
05.Description: Used to provide additional payment-related information for CCD, CTX, WEB, TEL, and XCK entries. Commonly used for remittance details in business-to-business transactions.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '05' specifying a CCD/CTX addenda record.

PaymentRelatedInformation.Name: Payment Related Information
PaymentRelatedInformation.Description: Freeform text field containing additional payment information, such as invoice numbers or remittance details.

AddendaSequenceNumber.Name: Addenda Sequence Number
AddendaSequenceNumber.Description: Indicates the sequence of this addenda record when multiple addenda records are present.

EntryDetailSequenceNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSequenceNumber.Description: Links this addenda record to the associated Entry Detail Record by repeating its trace number's last seven digits.

10.Name: Foreign Payment Addenda Record
10.Description: Provides details about a foreign payment, including the transaction code, amount, and company information.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '10' specifying Foreign Payment Addenda.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Transaction code, set to 'BUS' for business-related payments.

ForeignPaymentAmount.Name: Foreign Payment Amount
ForeignPaymentAmount.Description: Foreign payment amount calculated as DerDomAmtApplied * 100. No decimal point.

ForeignTraceNumber.Name: Foreign Trace Number
ForeignTraceNumber.Description: Blank field, left empty as per specification.

ReceivingCompanyName.Name: Receiving Company Name
ReceivingCompanyName.Description: Name of the receiving company, sourced from vendaddr_mst.name.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved field, space-filled for future use.

EntryDetail.Name: Entry Detail
EntryDetail.Description: This number matches the last seven digits of the Trace Number.

11.Name: IAT Originator Information
11.Description: Provides information about the originator of the international ACH transaction, including the originator's name and physical street address.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

OriginatorName.Name: Originator Name
OriginatorName.Description: Name of the originator from parms_mst.company. Field is 60 characters but will be truncated to 35.

StreetAddress.Name: Street Address
StreetAddress.Description: Physical address of the originator from parms_mst.addr##1. A PO Box is not allowed.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

EntryDetailSeqNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSeqNumber.Description: This number matches the last seven digits of the Trace Number.

12.Name: IAT Originator City, State, Country, and Postal Code
12.Description: Provides information about the originator's city, state, country, and postal code in the international ACH transaction.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '12' specifying Originator City, State, Country, and Postal Code information.

OriginatorCityState.Name: Originator City and State
OriginatorCityState.Description: The originator's city and state/province from parms_mst.city and parms_mst.state. Use an asterisk (*) between city and state, and a backslash (\) as the terminator.

OriginatorCountryPostalCode.Name: Originator Country and Postal Code
OriginatorCountryPostalCode.Description: The originator's country and postal code from parms_mst.country and parms_mst.zip. Use an asterisk (*) between country and postal code, and a backslash (\) as the terminator.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

EntryDetailSeqNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSeqNumber.Description: This number matches the last seven digits of the Trace Number.

13.Name: IAT Originating Bank Information
13.Description: Provides information about the originating bank in the international ACH transaction, including bank name, ID, and country code.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '13' specifying Originating Bank Information.

OriginatingBankName.Name: Originating Bank Name
OriginatingBankName.Description: Name of the originating bank from bank_hdr_mst.name.

OriginatingBankID.Name: Originating Bank ID
OriginatingBankID.Description: ID of the originating bank from bank_hdr_bank_file_fmt_mst.ach_orig_id.

OriginatingBranchCountryCode.Name: Originating Branch Country Code
OriginatingBranchCountryCode.Description: Country code of the originating branch from parms_mst.country.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

EntryDetailSeqNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSeqNumber.Description: This number matches the last seven digits of the Trace Number.

14.Name: IAT Receiving Bank Information
14.Description: Provides information about the receiving bank in the international ACH transaction, including bank name, routing number, and country code.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '14' specifying Receiving Bank Information.

ReceivingBankName.Name: Receiving Bank Name
ReceivingBankName.Description: Name of the receiving bank from vendor_mst.bank_name.

ReceivingNumberQualifier.Name: Receiving Number Qualifier
ReceivingNumberQualifier.Description: Qualifier for the receiving bank's routing number from vendor.transit_reference. Defaults to '01' if the Receiving Branch Country Code is 'US'.

ReceivingBankRoutingNumber.Name: Receiving Bank Routing Number
ReceivingBankRoutingNumber.Description: Routing number of the receiving bank from vendor_mst.transit.

ReceivingBranchCountryCode.Name: Receiving Branch Country Code
ReceivingBranchCountryCode.Description: Country code of the receiving branch from vendaddr_mst.country.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

EntryDetailSeqNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSeqNumber.Description: This number matches the last seven digits of the Trace Number.

15.Name: IAT Receiver Information
15.Description: Provides information about the receiver in the international ACH transaction, including receiver ID and street address.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

ReceiversIDNumber.Name: Receiver's ID Number
ReceiversIDNumber.Description: Identifier for the receiver from vendor_mst.vend_num.

ReceiversStreetAddress.Name: Receiver's Street Address
ReceiversStreetAddress.Description: Street address of the receiver from vendaddr_mst.addr##1 (either vadRAddr_1 or VadAddr_1).

EntryDetailSeqNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSeqNumber.Description: This number matches the last seven digits of the Trace Number.

16.Name: IAT Receiving DFI Identification Number Qualifier
16.Description: Specifies the identification number qualifier for the receiving DFI.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '16' for Receiving DFI ID Qualifier.

ReceivingDFIIDQualifier.Name: Receiving DFI ID Qualifier
ReceivingDFIIDQualifier.Description: Qualifier indicating the type of ID number for the receiving DFI.

17.Name: IAT Receiving DFI Identification
17.Description: Contains the identification number of the receiving DFI.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '17' for Receiving DFI Identification.

ReceivingDFIID.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIID.Description: Identification number of the receiving DFI.

18.Name: IAT Foreign Exchange Reference Information
18.Description: Provides foreign exchange information related to the international ACH transaction.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '18' for Foreign Exchange Reference Information.

ForeignExchangeIndicator.Name: Foreign Exchange Indicator
ForeignExchangeIndicator.Description: Indicates whether foreign exchange is involved ('Y' or 'N').

ForeignExchangeRate.Name: Foreign Exchange Rate
ForeignExchangeRate.Description: Exchange rate for the currency conversion.

ISOOriginatingCurrencyCode.Name: ISO Originating Currency Code
ISOOriginatingCurrencyCode.Description: ISO currency code of the originating currency.

ISODestinationCurrencyCode.Name: ISO Destination Currency Code
ISODestinationCurrencyCode.Description: ISO currency code of the destination currency.

98.Name: Notification of Change Addenda Record
98.Description: Provides details on the specific change needed in the recipientâ€™s account information, used with COR SEC code entries.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Type code '98' for Notification of Change.

CorrectedData.Name: Corrected Data
CorrectedData.Description: Details of the corrected information, such as new routing or account number.

ChangeCode.Name: Change Code
ChangeCode.Description: A three-character code indicating the type of change (e.g., C01 for incorrect account number).

OriginalEntryTraceNumber.Name: Original Entry Trace Number
OriginalEntryTraceNumber.Description: Trace number from the original entry to which the correction applies.

DateOfChange.Name: Date of Change
DateOfChange.Description: Date the change was made, in YYMMDD format.
